businessName.description: Name of the business being called

decisionMaker.description: Name of the person in charge of logistics and shipping

email.description: Email address to send rates and services

internationalYN.description: Whether they send outside the UK (Y or N)

country1.description: First main country they send to

country2.description: Second main country they send to

country3.description: Third main country they send to

exampleShipment.description: Example shipment details including weight and dimensions

domesticFrequency.description: How often they send around the UK

standardRateUpToKg.description: Standard rate they pay up to a certain kg

exclFuelVAT.description: Whether the rate excludes fuel and VAT

singleVsMultiParcel.description: Whether they mainly send single parcels or multiple parcels

receptionistName.description: Name of the receptionist if we need to call back

callbackNeeded.description: Whether a callback is needed (Y or N)
